sentences.sContent: The administration is just stonewalling in an attempt to hide their political embarrassment.
sentences.sCn: 政府只是在故意拖延，企图掩盖其政治窘态。

synos.tran: 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球
妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球

trans.tranCn: 拖延议事， 设置障碍
trans.tranOther: to delay a discussion, decision etc by talking a lot and refusing to answer questions
